title: Xray JQL Extractor Parameters
description: Configuration parameters for the Xray JQL Extractor component.

#xray_client_id.title: Xray Client ID:
#xray_client_id.description: Your Xray Cloud Client ID for API authentication. Obtain this from Xray Cloud security settings.

#xray_client_secret.title: Xray Client Secret:
#xray_client_secret.description: Your Xray Cloud Client Secret for API authentication. Obtain this from Xray Cloud security settings.

jql_input_column.title: JQL Input Column Name:
jql_input_column.description: The exact name of the column in the input table that contains JQL queries.

result_output_column.title: Output Result Column Name:
result_output_column.description: The name for the new column that will be added to the output table to store the Xray API result (e.g., JSON response or parsed value).

incremental.title: Incremental Load Enabled:
incremental.description: If true, output data will be loaded incrementally. Set to false for full table replace (recommended for updating existing rows).

debug.title: Enable Debug Logging:
debug.description: If true, enables verbose debug logging in the job output.
